intro: Chisocheton balansae, commonly known as the Balansae chisocheton, is a species of flowering plant in the family Meliaceae. It is native to the Philippines and is characterized by its evergreen foliage and small, fragrant flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth surface, while its fruit is a woody capsule containing several seeds. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
